Statute.Title: Free Trade and Labour Mobility in Canada Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Libre-échange et la mobilité de la main-d’œuvre au Canada, Loi sur le)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2025, c. 2, s. 2, enacting ss. 1 to 13 of the Free Trade and Labour Mobility in Canada Act, in force 01.01.2026 see SI/2025-107 — Not in force
